vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Freese and Nichols, Inc. to provide additional construction management services for improvements at the Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant, the East Side Water Treatment Plant, the Bachman Water Treatment Plant, and several pumping facilities - Not to exceed $4,361,813.00, from $7,042,700.00 to $11,404,513.00 - Financing:  Water Capital Improvement D Fund
